name: Acid Labs
tagline: Tech specialists for E-Commerce and Fintech
description:
At Acid Labs we build apps to meet individual requirements in the retail industry. We believe in permanent communication, lots of feedback and rapid prototyping to create amazing fintech apps, e-commerce experiences and marketplaces, as well as consumers and internal mobile apps.
We don't just develop, but also log and measure user's events to develop the right user acquisition strategies together with our clients.
